item.title: US home sales remained sluggish in August despite late-summer mortgage rate slide
item.description: Sales of previously occupied U.S. homes remained sluggish in August, despite a late-summer slide in mortgage rates

item.title: Ticketmaster to give fans more information after uproar over Oasis ticket sales
item.description: Ticketmaster has committed to changes after facing criticism over ticket sales for Oasis' reunion concerts in the U.K. this summer

item.title: On North Carolina’s rivers and streams, cleanup of Helene’s fury seems never-ending
item.description: It’s been only a year since Hurricane Helene hammered the southeast U.S. from Florida to the Carolinas
